definitions.explanation_en: A surname of Irish origin, commonly found in English-speaking countries; often associated with individuals in various fields such as politics, sports, or entertainment.
definitions.explanation_cn: 源自爱尔兰的姓氏，常见于英语国家；常与政治、体育或娱乐领域的个人相关联。
definitions.example_en: Callahan was elected mayor of the city in 2022.
definitions.example_cn: 卡勒汉于2022年当选为该市市长。

definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun used to refer to specific notable individuals, such as the fictional character Detective Callahan from the 'Dirty Harry' film series.
definitions.explanation_cn: 用作专有名词，指代特定知名人物，例如电影《肮脏的哈里》系列中的侦探卡勒汉。
definitions.example_en: Clint Eastwood's portrayal of Callahan made the character an icon of tough-law enforcement cinema.
definitions.example_cn: 克林特·伊斯特伍德对卡勒汉的演绎使这一角色成为硬派执法电影的标志性人物。

comparison.analysis: “Surname”（姓氏）是通用术语，泛指任何家族姓氏，而 “Callahan” 是一个具体的姓氏实例。前者是类别，后者是成员。
“Name”（名字）可指全名、姓氏或名字，范围更广；而 “Callahan” 仅指姓氏部分，不具备名字或中间名的含义。
“Character”（角色）指虚构人物的整体设定，而 “Callahan” 仅是该角色的姓氏，是其身份的一部分，不能等同于角色本身。
